name: Pompeius
description:
Hello everyone!

My game is a puzzle in an isometric style, with interesting and diverse levels, which will not let you get bored thanks to different mechanisms, as well as complex secrets and Easter eggs.

This game is made for mobile platforms, but in order for me to get there, I need a start-up capital, which I hope to get here. I will spend this capital on the developer's account and on a small ad.

This project is very dear to me, so if I can put the game on the Play Market (after the App Store), I will support and improve it for a long time.
